attr.title: Halloween Forever
attr.desc: Something mysterious is happening in the pumpkin patch this Halloween! You control Pumpkin Man, a humanoid pumpkin thing animated by occult forces on a quest to discover why things are so creepy. And you vomit candy corn.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://imaginarymonsters.itch.io/halloween-forever), download the Halloween Forever - Modern Edition (2021) version, extract it, and copy the game files to the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://imaginarymonsters.itch.io/halloween-forever), download the *Halloween Forever - Modern Edition (2021)* version, extract it, and copy the game files to the port's *gamedata* folder.
